Euless.Delta Air Lines Flight 1141:
Delta Air Lines Flight 1141 was a scheduled domestic passenger flight between Dallas/Fort Worth, Texas and Salt Lake City, Utah. On August 31, 1988, the flight, operated by a Boeing 727, crashed during takeoff, killing 14 of the 108 people on board, and injuring 76 others.


== Involved ==


=== Aircraft ===
The aircraft was a Boeing 727-200 Advanced, registration N473DA, a three-engine narrow-body jet aircraft.
